## Events.MarkerMove.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `MarkerMove` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(opt_block?: Block | null, isCursor?: boolean, opt_oldNode?: ASTNode | null, opt_newNode?: ASTNode);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_block | [Block](./blockly.block_class.md) \| null | <i>(Optional)</i> The affected block. Null if current node is of type workspace. Undefined for a blank event. |
|  isCursor | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether this is a cursor event. Undefined for a blank event. |
|  opt\_oldNode | ASTNode \| null | <i>(Optional)</i> The old node the marker used to be on. Undefined for a blank event. |
|  opt\_newNode | ASTNode | <i>(Optional)</i> The new node the marker is now on. Undefined for a blank event. |
